name: gemini-streaming-with-functions
description: Proof of concept React application that integrates with Google Gemini API to stream responses and handle predefined local functions.

scripts.build: npm --prefix client install && npm --prefix client run build
scripts.dev: concurrently -k "npm --prefix client run build -- --watch" "nodemon --watch index.js --watch tools.js --ext js,mjs --exec 'node index.js'"
